message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well beyond $10000. Considering the high quality and versatility of this product, I am offering it to you for an exclusive price of $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset that could greatly enhance your operations and competitive edge in the market. I look forward to discussing the details with you further. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding.
